content: In some resources we have a xxxDefinition and xxx: Device, Plan, Specimen, Observations.. Some resources predate this, for example Measure. Do we want to align? And if we do, is it not too late?
I don't think alignment of name is critical.
not critical, but it would be good. Measure really confused me for a long time.
Feel free to submit change requests where you think warranted and work groups can debate the value
